sections.text: The Vanderbilt MBA develops principled leaders through a rigorous, customizable two‑year program with experiential learning and a collaborative culture.
The two‑year program begins with a general management core and expands into personalized electives, labs, and interdisciplinary study.

items: Online application with transcripts, resume, essays
GMAT, GRE, or Executive Assessment required (unless waived)
sections.text: Applicants must demonstrate quantitative and leadership potential with test scores (unless waived), academic transcripts, essays, and recommendations.
Graduates take leadership roles across consulting, technology, healthcare, and finance.
